title: 3d Fruit Ninja Simulation
description: Created a 3D simulation of a UR10e in Python.

modalContent.value: Created a 3D simulation of a UR10e in Python, applying principles of physics-based modeling and 3D graphics to develop an interactive and engaging virtual experience. I created it as a TA for the students in the Foundations of Robotics graduate student course at NYU Tandon.
